name: ifpbicor
body: |- wb(wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)), wif(w1, w0, wn(w0)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr3i(wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)), wif(w1, w0, wn(w0)), wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w0))
